Title: "Custom Metadata and Entity Matching in Azure Search"
Text:
C:\Users\adamh\Downloads\azure-search.pdfGates", "caseSensitive" : false },             { "text" : "BillG", "caseSensitive" : true }         ]     },      {          "name" : "Xbox One",          "type": "Hardware",         "subtype" : "Gaming Device",         "id" :
"4e36bf9d-5550-4396-8647-8e43d7564a76",         "description" : "The Xbox One product"     },      {          "name" : "LinkedIn" ,          "description" : "The LinkedIn company",          "id" : "differentIdentifyingScheme123",          "fuzzyEditDistance" :
0      },      {          "name" : "Microsoft" ,          "description" : "Microsoft Corporation",          "id" : "differentIdentifyingScheme987",          "defaultCaseSensitive" : false,          "defaultFuzzyEditDistance" : 1,          "aliases" : [              { "text" : "MSFT", "caseSensitive" : true }         ]     }  ]  Field nameDescriptiondescription(Optional) This field can be used as a passthrough for custommetadata about the matched text(s).
The value of this field willappear with every match of its entity in the skill output.type(Optional) This field can be used as a passthrough for custommetadata about the matched text(s). The value of this field willappear with every match of its entity in the skill output.subtype(Optional) This field can be used as a passthrough for custommetadata about the matched text(s). The value of this field willappear with every match of its entity in the skill output.id(Optional) This field can be used as a passthrough for custommetadata about the matched text(s). The value of this field willappear with every match of its entity in the skill output.caseSensitive(Optional) Defaults to false.
